attributes.additional_details:
That HM government should condemn Operation Pillar of Defence which has already resulted in the deaths of many Palestinians including the assassination of a senior government leader as well as deaths of Israelis.
Should also take immediate action to prevent any escalation of violence and any armed incursion into Gaza or any repetition of Operation Cast Lead and call for an immediate ceasefire and end to the long lasting illegal siege of Gaza which has caused untold death and suffering as well.
